name: Context
description: Context is a code editor application that lets users write, compile, and collaborate on code in real time. It supports versioning, user authentication, secure document sharing, and a live preview compiler for multiple languages.

name: NBA PER Prediction Model
description: This project applies data mining and machine learning to predict Player Efficiency Rating (PER) using advanced NBA statistics. Built using Python, the model draws from 11 seasons of NBA data (2014â€“2024) and was designed with a focus on predictive accuracy, feature analysis, and real-world usability.

name: Digital Manager
description: This management system is a Java-based application built with Swing that allows users to store and manipulate employee records. Designed as a CRUD system, the application is ideal for small businesses or teams that need a lightweight, local employee record manager.

name: Garden By Deka
description: A gardening blog created for TikTok creator Deka (@ladybugs2002). This site showcases all the work she put into her garden. There's four pages, and they all share a consistent theme built with HTM, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Guessing Game
description: This is a command-line guessing game. It randomly generates a three-digit code using digits between 0 and 9. The user has eight tries to guess the correct number. After each attempt, the program provides hints indicating whether the guess is too high or too low, how many digits are correct and in the correct position, and how many are correct but in the wrong position.

name: Python Image Recognition
description: This is a command-line guessing game. It randomly generates a three-digit code using digits between 0 and 9. The user has eight tries to guess the correct number. After each attempt, the program provides hints indicating whether the guess is too high or too low, how many digits are correct and in the correct position, and how many are correct but in the wrong position.

name: Binder
description: A personal media library for audio and video files. Users can upload, organize, and stream content through a clean interface, create playlists, and share their library with others. Includes search, filters, and profile sharing features.

name: Organ
description: A quick-capture tool for saving URLs, text/code snippets, and notes with a simple keyboard shortcut. Stores items in an organized dashboard, uses AI to generate summaries and keyword tags for fast search.

name: Craft
description: An AI-powered interview practice app. Users can simulate interviews with voice AI, receive instant feedback on answers, tone, and pacing, and review detailed performance metrics to improve.

name: Queue AS
description: A smart appointment scheduling system for clinics and businesses. Handles conflict detection, automated reminders, secure patient/customer data, and role-based user access with an easy-to-use dashboard.
